summary: This document is an email correspondence involving Jeffrey Epstein and Jes Staley, discussing a financial story idea related to the stock market and unemployment. Landon Thomas, a financial correspondent for the New York Times, is also mentioned as he seeks insights from Epstein regarding market perspectives.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Epstein is the main subject of the email correspondence, discussing financial matters and providing insights.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Staley is the recipient of the email from Epstein, indicating a professional relationship.

persons.name: Landon Thomas Jr.
persons.context: Thomas is mentioned as a financial correspondent for the New York Times, seeking information from Epstein for a story.

keyFacts: The email correspondence took place on September 2, 2010.
Jeffrey Epstein discusses financial insights with Jes Staley.
